animeDescription: Takahashi loves Oohara, and Oohara loves Takahashi, but neither of them knows of the others' feelings yet. Moreover, Takahashi died. How can their love come to be now?
animeStaff: [['Raika, Ken', 'Director, Episode Director'], ['Tatsumi', 'Episode Director, Animation Director'], ['Sawayama, Shinichiro', 'Script, Screenplay'], ['Kazumi, Yoshiyuki', 'Original Creator']]
